_source.short_description: Hang when trying to print VISIO document
Oracle Down
_source.description: The PeopleSoft Oracle instance is down (again).

_source.short_description: Boot with shift key held down
_source.description: If the shift key is not held down, the RAID enclosure does not power on.

_source.short_description: Windows XP SP2 causing errors in Enterprise
_source.cause_notes: Corporate desktop apps do not support SP2
_source.description: SP2 is causing several applications not to work anymore.

_source.short_description: My laptop is performing very badly
_source.description: A few days ago I made some modification to some Windows config, and since then my laptop is performing slowly. Is there any way to go back to a previous state?

_source.close_notes: Intermittent issue, restarting as a workaround until this happens more frequently
_source.short_description: Oracle database running slowly and dropping connections
_source.description: Oracle database running slowly and dropping connections

_source.close_notes: needed latest patch - after patch all is well
_source.short_description: Exchange server outage
_source.fix_notes: needed latest patch - after patch all is well

_source.short_description: Cannot disable wireless when plug into an Ethernet port
_source.description: Using a Dell Wireless WLAN Utility I cannot enable the option to disable wireless when plugin into an Ethernet port

_source.short_description: Email system is down again

_source.close_notes: This is a Service Catalog item request
_source.short_description: Request for a Blackberry
Lawson DB seems to be running slowly
_source.description: Lawson DB seems to be running slowly. Tried several things and need to find the root cause

_source.short_description: Unable to connect to Wifi
_source.description: Not able to connect to Wifi. Tried to connect with different devices.

_source.short_description: Unable to send or receive emails.
_source.description: Unable to send or receive emails.Looks like issue is with the email server.

_source.short_description: Slow switching
Router Down
_source.description: The 1st floor router is down again. Nobody down there can get at anything outside their own subnet.

_source.short_description: The Webex application is unavailable to all employees
_source.cause_notes: Server does not meet minimum specs to run the meeting server
_source.fix_notes: Upgrade CPU and RAM to meet minimum specs

_source.close_notes: OS and hardware vendor cannot find the root cause as it is intermittent. So they recommend restarting the PC
_source.short_description: USB port has stopped working
_source.cause_notes: This is a timing issue caused when you plug and unplug USB devices quickly
_source.workaround: As this is intermittent. Restarting the PC fixes this.

_source.short_description: 2nd Floor File Server Short on Space
_source.description: We really, really need to buy more drives for the second floor file. The users keep filling up their 10 MB quota, and they aren't going to take it much longer.

_source.short_description: Unknown source of SAP outage
_source.description: Several hours ago we experienced a flood of incidents related to various SAP applications. It has been determined that there is an outage of unknown origin. We are performing root cause analysis.

_source.close_notes: patched server all is fine now.
_source.short_description: Email down
_source.cause_notes: Log shows ISP was dropping/resetting the connection
_source.description: Email went down - failed over to alternate server but need to determine root cause on ironMail-SD-01
_source.fix_notes: ISP applied a fix on their side and mails are flowing smoothly again

_source.short_description: Can't access SFA software
_source.cause_notes: Siebel SFA does not support this version of Orcale
_source.description: Performance of the Siebel SFA software has been severely degraded since the upgrade performed this weekend. We moved to an unsupported Oracle DB version.
_source.fix_notes: Upgrade to the latest version of Oracle

_source.short_description: Switch occasionally drops connections
Unable to connect to the VPN
_source.description: Unable to connect to the VPN using the valid credentials.

_source.short_description: Issue in connecting to internet using modem.
_source.description: Issue in connecting to internet using modem.
